spanish: De que se trata todo esto?

phrase: 因为我病了所以没去上学
english: I didn't go to school because I got sick
spanish: No fuí a la escuela porque me enfermé

english: Could you give me this book?

spanish: Lo que mas me gusta es leer libros

english: I wish you a happy new year
spanish: Te deseo un feliz año nuevo

english: You have to go home early
spanish: Tienes que ir a casa temprano

english: He commutes to work on foot

spanish: hoy hace más frío que ayer

english: There are four people in my family
I have been working for ten years
He will turn ten years old this year
spanish: Él cumple diez años este año
